_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Plutonium
author: ptero@minepos.net

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install rar wget ca-certificates

## Mount Pterodactyl Docker Container
if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

## Go to tmp directory and download PreSetup Server
cd /tmp/
wget https://vault.our-space.xyz/ATOM/T6_Server.rar
mv ./T6_Server.rar /mnt/server

## Go to Container and extract Server
cd /mnt/server/
rar x T6_Server.rar

## Create Shortcut
ln -s ,nt/server/T6_Server/Server/zone ~/T6_Server/Server/Zombie/zone
ln -s mnt/server/T6_Server/Server/zone ~/T6_Server/Server/Multiplayer/zone

## Make start Script Executable
chmod +x mnt/server/T6_Server/Plutonium/T6Server.sh

## Make User Aware of the Setup Origin
echo "\n# Unofficial Pterodactyl-Plutonium Server \nThe help is not yet written please refer to garycraft@our-space.xyz or [<@478668961626587157>](paste this in discord chat) in discord" >> README

variables.name: Plutonium server key
variables.description: Paste the server key from https://platform.plutonium.pw/serverkeys

variables.name: Server Mode
variables.description:
Game Mode
Multiplayer  -> t6mp 
Zombie -> t6zm
